Text:
Requirements:
Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD Athlon64 X2
2 GB of RAM
24 GB free hard disk space
Graphic card: ATI Radeon HD 4850 or NVIDIA GeForce 9600 
or faster with at least 512 MB
PC: Windows XP / Windows Vista / Windows 7
Mac: Intel based Apple Mac computers running Mac OS X 
10.6.8 or 10.7.3 or newer.
Its recommended to use a Joystick to control the aircraft.
